Equation: CoA [m] + H+ [m] + citrate [m] ⇔ H2O [m] + OAA [m] + acetyl-CoA [m]
CoA [m] + GTP [m] + succinate [m] ⇔ GDP [m] + Pi [m] + succinyl-CoA [m]
ATP [c] + CoA [c] + citrate [c] ⇒ ADP [c] + OAA [c] + Pi [c] + acetyl-CoA [c]
ADP [m] + Pi [m] + succinyl-CoA [m] ⇔ ATP [m] + CoA [m] + succinate [m]
AKG [m] + CoA [m] + NAD+ [m] ⇒ CO2 [m] + NADH [m] + succinyl-CoA [m]
H2O [x] + O2 [x] + glyoxalate [x] ⇒ H+ [x] + H2O2 [x] + oxalate [x]
H2O [c] + NAD+ [c] + glycolaldehyde [c] ⇒ 2 H+ [c] + NADH [c] + glycolate [c]
H2O [m] + NAD+ [m] + glycolaldehyde [m] ⇒ 2 H+ [m] + NADH [m] + glycolate [m]
H2O [c] + NAD+ [c] + glyoxalate [c] ⇒ 2 H+ [c] + NADH [c] + oxalate [c]
